alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 25 at 8:54PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...AREAS OF FOG WILL REMAIN ALONG THE COAST FROM ST AUGUSTINE NORTHWARD TO ST SIMONS ISLAND THROUGH LATE THIS EVENING... Areas of fog over the near shore waters will continue to move onshore along the Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia coasts. The fog will remain primarily between the coast and I-95 through midnight and possibly expand further inland. Areas most affected will include St Augustine northwards through Fernandina Beach and into coastal Southeast Georgia including Brunswick and St Simons Island. Visibility may fall down to around a mile or less through late tonight including around the Jax Beaches, Mayport, and along the St Johns river into trout river and into portions of downtown Jacksonville.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns
